tool_description: Universal translator of high quality text
name: Prima Translation
title: Prima Translation

api_list.name: Create Translation
api_list.description:
Sending the text to transfer to service. 

The main feature of our system of active translation of the text is payment for contacting API, which allows you to greatly reduce the cost compared to competitors.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://prima-translation.p.rapidapi.com/task"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prima-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://prima-translation.p.rapidapi.com/task"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "prima-translation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
